title: Having issues Patching 6.22? Click Here!
body:
Hey everyone,

Welcome to Preseason!  Rolling out with Patch 6.22, we've got a lot of cool new things in store and we can't wait for you guys to give it a try; assassin changes, new support items, and PLANTS! So many plants...

http://i.imgur.com/eMFU34F.jpg

To help get you back to your roots, we've got some troubleshooting you can try in the event you're getting any problems. If you have a completely different issue with the patch, just hit us up below and we'll help you further!

----------------------------------------------

>#***Files Scanned reaches over 9000!!!!! Or, 15k, 20k, etc***

The patcher needs to scan already installed files to make sure that none of the files are corrupt.  If it finds one, it replaces it and rescans the files.  This is why it can sometimes get as high as 20k, even though there aren't 20k files in the installation.  

**The best thing to do is let it scan files!**  If you restart the client, it may cause it to scan even more files.   The patcher will eventually stop scanning files, and it will patch normally afterward.

>#***Patcher never pops up, or disappears after you press "LAUNCH"***

This can be caused by corruption with the patcher itself or it failed to properly self-patch. Additionally, it may be due to some issues with the configuration of your computer system's permissions (meaning it can't properly save the files in the correct location). To resolve this, make sure to complete all the steps in our [Patching Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues)!
 
>#***Patcher stops/errors out at 33%, Patcher fails at 99%, or a general "Unspecified Error has occurred" message***

These are usually connection related errors. Either your computer is unable to maintain a stable connection, or a 3rd party security program is blocking League of Legends from properly patching. Many of the most common Anti-virus programs [have already whitelisted LoL](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3), however make sure to update yours to the latest version!

Also, even though you may have set specific exceptions in place before for your security program, League of Legends has gone through a major update. Therefore, your security program may recognize the old version of League of Legends, but not the new version. 

To get these issues resolved ASAP, make sure to go through our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)!

--------------------------------------------------------------

*If after completing these steps, and you still do not see the glorious orange 'LAUNCH' button, feel free to drop us a post in this thread!  Rioters as well as Wrenchmen volunteers will be on hand to respond and provide some additional help!*

replies.body: Hi, I've been having problems lately with my ping. After patching 6.22 with no errors. I manage to load into champ select, and go in game as usual. But for some strange reason, I cannot play well in game at all, because of continuous lag spiking after the patch. It's been going on for days now, and I'm very upset as I keep losing most of these games because of it. I found out that some others are having the same issue with lag spiking after patching, but their's don't seem as severe as mine. I usually have a steady ping of 25, but since 6.22, ping jitters have shot up my ping to 500, then it goes away, then up and down, etc. I need help asap so I can play peacefully without fuming over some stupid issue. Only when I play League does the ping spike starts, other things like other games and internet have been fine.

I've been having the exact same problem. Getting 15 ms jitter, ping spiking to 300 and just sitting there then going back down a minute or two later. Tried flushing my dns and changing to an open dns server.

Probably just going to send a support ticket with my traceroute logs, but I doubt they'll reply anytime soon.

Hi, While updating my progress bar will get to about 5-6% and then it will say "an unspecified error has occurred". I have restarted two times already, any tips you could give me would be helpful. Thank you.
A quick update, it would appear after restarting again that the dl might be working.
If it gets stuck again just let me know what percentage it got stuck at. I'll give you some steps to try!
I have the same problem what to do i re-installed the game but all the time gets stuck on random percentage pls help :(

Hi, after getting unspecified error I forced re-patch same error again,then I clicked the repair and after it's work same error on the screen but launch button was  there and visible then againg i did not work.So I restarted the client and it began to scan the files after 240 files boom same error again.Can someone pls help me play the game in this precious times.
Same problem. Any fixes?
Hi Un5 Swarc! How far did you make it in the patcher in percentage? I'm happy to help!
im having issues like that in eu as well it just starts after it reads some files,error comes out right after

Please Help Me I am begging when i hit launch i see only my desktop...when i hit league again it shows me a black screen where login is suppose to be but the black screen is there i am really sad and mad at same time Hextech tool wont help at all i re unstalled the a butch of times but nothing i really want play league Patcher never pops up after i hit launch PLEASE fix this PLEASE{{champion:157}}
My percentage simply stays at 0% says 1 files scanned before giving me the unspecified error message. What can I do?

i have same exact problem i tried fixing and repatching nothing happened it just stay at 0% and says 1 file scanned then give error message...
so i think after all this time playing this game for over 1 whole year (its the only game i played it for more than 3 months) i think its time to say goodbye :'(
At what percentage are you seeing the unspecified error? Let me know and I can provide some steps for you to try!
It only stay at 0% for like 10 minutes and 1 file scanned then gives unspecified error message please help :( i wrote a ticket no one responded until now its there for like 2 days
same for me =({{summoner:4}}

this is really as same as mine... im really frustrated about this..... 


plz help..

been play for more then a few years now since mid season one actually. probably dumped around 300 real money into this game for gifts etc. im the last of my IRL friends to play it as most of them grew to resent riot and hate league of assassins. after this recent patch im joining them in exodus. this recent patch ruined shaco who was hardly OP and more tactical then anything else then ruined alistar. no stuns really?? then buffs kuntarina literally the most OP champ always in this game. and now after buffing assassins your nerfing tank items that boost teamwork. lets continue destroying the element of team play in this game while catering to the "MAH K/D rate" crowd of COD shitbags. as for why im posting this here. well i think its a pretty big error on your part riot and i certainly have a problem with it. but dont worry i found my solution im deleting the game . have fun and thanks for all the fish.{{item:3151}}
There is a small bit that i can agree with, the tank synergy item nerfs, kat was out of play and yes shaco is worse now.

SOOOOO. After i downloaded this new client it doesn't fit the screen and i cant adjust it. On top of that every time i drag the window over so i can see the right side of the screen it disappears. Anyone else having this problem? Please Riot fix it
I'm also having that problem, I've tried changing the display but it didn't work. Maybe I have to change the display and restart league it might work

ok so i figure it out. Change the resolution of your screen so you can fit the league window in it without moving it. My screen res was 1024x720 and i changed it to 1080x1920. After that you can hit the setting button on league and adjust your screen resolution for league. I changed mine to my normal res of 1024x720. once you did that you can change your screen resolution back to the old settings and it will be fixed and fit inside your screen with no parts blocked off.
Ok thank you very much. It fixed it.

Hi, Every time I try to load the game right after pressing the play button the launcher disappears. I looked into my task manager and it was there so I thought it was gonna need to take some time so I left it alone for 10mins and its still the same. Plz HELP!
{{champion:157}}

Hi. When i started patching i got an "Unspecified Error" at around 50%. I restarted it and again, the same thing happend. I looked up my problem and they said that you should switch to the Oceania server and back. I tried it and it worked, but then it stopped at 99% and stayed there for an hour untill i quit the launcher. I read this discussion and turned off my firewall and then i started patching. Again it stopped at 99%. Does anyone have a solution for this?

Same, help!
My league isnt patching. Its still at 33% , I dont think its my firewall. Can I get help??

Hello the new client looks awesome but for some reason it won't load any pictures for me, this includes champions, shop,masteries,icons,in game picking champions. Although when the agme loads everything is normal and I have no lags at all and perfect wifi connection

Hi, I too am experiencing update issues. Im in desperate need of help. All my friends are able to play league but me... Ive have many issues in the past and Im at the point of just giving up all togather.... Ive invested lots of time and money and i just would like to play . Im giving unspecific error message and being advised to check the logs. Ive tired just about everything on  http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/qGY56UB4-comprehensive-troubleshooting-your-patching-issues and still no results. what should i do?

im playing league for over a year now
and i had this problem maybe twice already

i tried to run as admin from everywhere you can do it.
i tried reinstalling.
i tried with the hextech repair tool.

cuz i tried to reinstall the game. and i cant go in the client whatsoever.
so i have no folder of league on my pc.
please help me :)
thanks

*N E E D H E L P A S A P*

Please help, i haven't played in 4 days and I cannot find a solution to my problem anywhere:(

Please close it and try again" but I've done this multiple times and nothing. I even re-downloaded the game to see but nothing. If any one could help id appreciate it!

after the update I have so much lag during the champion select  that I have to spam click the champion I want and this makes people upset because I run support and when someone else calls I cant see it.

how can I fix this huge lag problem?

hi after the patch 3 days from now im having trouble playing the game/ my issues are lagging on chat on game already adjusted resolution to a very low, and after every match in the end of the game i was stuck... the only solution i need to do is to forcefully shutdown my laptop by pressing power button its so risky it might crashed my hard disk. i do not know what happen to the update since i do not have problem upgrading my client when the patch was released, im using windows 10 before the patch lol was running smoothly hope someone could help me

No matter what i do the launcher will not work. How do i fix this?

I get into champ select just fine but as soon as I try to join a game it never works and the loading screen goes from black to white and tells me it's not responding I even tried going back to the legacy client nothin seems to work two games have been remade from this issue and I'm losing lp and I'm very frustrated
